verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We shall see the King.
We shall see the King when He comes.
He is coming in power, we hail the blessed hour.
We shall see the King when He comes.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There's a blessed, blessed time that's coming soon,
It may be evening, morning, or at noon,
The wedding of the bride, united with the groom.
We shall see the King when He comes.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O, my brother, are you ready for the call?
To crown your Savior King and Lord of all?
The kingdoms of this world shall soon before Him fall.
We shall see the King when He comes.
